front.title: Identification of IPv6 Routes that need Tunneling - Use of BGP Extended Community Attribute

abstract.t: In this document we provide methods to discover and connect nativeIPV6 clouds that are separated by IPV4 Internet. BGP-MP [2] is usedas protocol to discover IPV6 relay routers. BGP-MP(BGP4+) [3] isused to distribute IPV6 routes. Encapsulation of IPV6 presented in[4] is used to tunnel IPv6 traffic across IPV4 Internet. The methodpresented here is known as 6in4 as opposed to 6to4 [4] or 6over4[5].
